page.title: 07 LOCAL SLANG WORDS
page.content: We have gathered together words which children in{Ellesmere port}use in everyday speech. {A Joey}-someone not very bright {A Ticket}-a stupid person {A Wally}-a person with no common sense {E.P.I.C}(Ellesmere Port Indoor Centre) -great,superb {Ace}-great,marvellous {Brill}-short for "brilliant" {Skill}-wonderful {A Scally(Scalliwag)}-rogue {Sound}-the very best {Cool}-trendy,fashionable {A Slaphead/Spamhead}-bald person {Wally-watchers/Brits/Metromen}-British Legion Patrol Men {Chuddie}-chewing gum {Farm on wheels}-a Police car {Ozzie}-Hospital {Woollybacks}-rural people{ {Loo/Bog}-Toilet
